Description_lang: Inflicts $s2 Fire damage in a frontal cone, divided evenly among all players struck, and increasing damage taken by Flame Rend by $s3% for $d. This attack also knocks all victims away, and the force of the knockback is also divided among all players struck.If too few players are affected, Aggramar gains stacks of $@spellname244713.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage of Flame Rend increased by $s3%.
